comments.body:
The pyro4 package is imported at Pyro4 in Python.  This capitalization is
necessary.

On Fri, May 27, 2016 at 4:02 PM, jakirkham notifications@github.com wrote:

> In recipes/pyomo.extras/meta.yaml
> https://github.com/conda-forge/staged-recipes/pull/501#discussion_r64959614
> :
> 
> > -    - sympy
> > -    - pymysql
> > -    - pyodbc
> > -    - pyro4
> > -    - pyyaml
> > -    - suds-jurko
> > -    - xlrd
> >   +
> >   +test:
> > -  imports:
> > -    - IPython
> > -    - openpyxl
> > -    - sympy
> > -    - pymysql
> > -    - pyodbc
> > -    - Pyro4
> 
> Also, please lower case.
> 
> â€”
> You are receiving this because you authored the thread.
> Reply to this email directly, view it on GitHub
> https://github.com/conda-forge/staged-recipes/pull/501/files/39842b5d5f0eae084256bfbb7ab07f154575f274#r64959614,
> or mute the thread
> https://github.com/notifications/unsubscribe/AAsb-DiGGx4TTvu5spsAnAB2IWBuT_wFks5qF03IgaJpZM4IUwIm
> .
Oh sorry. I was thinking these were run deps for a second. Not Python imports. Please forgive the noise.
